overview: „Prophet” (Prorok) is a feature film about Cardinal Wyszyński – the Primate of Poland, who, after three years of suffering internment at the hands of the communist authorities, once again stands at the head of the Church in Poland.  The film is the feature début of Michał Kondrat, whose previous feature documentaries have won acclaim among audiences around the world.  The film tells the story of the Primate, a spiritual leader and visionary, who talks to the communist authorities to negotiate more rights for the Church and the oppressed nation. The apparent agreement turns into a silent war: a struggle for religious freedom and human dignity.
tagline: The Man Who Paved The Way For Pope John Paul II
title: Prophet
